description: Viggo Brun's ternary continued fraction algorithm applied to { log 2, log 3/2, log 5/4 } produces a list of triples (p,q,r); sequence gives p values.
references: V. Brun, Music and ternary continued fractions, Kgl. Norske Videnskabers Selskab Forh., 23 (No. 10, 1950).
V. Brun, Musikk og Euklidske algoritmer (in Danish), Nordisk Mat. Tidskr, 9 (1961), 29-36.
links: Vigo Brun, Music and ternary continued fractions, Kgl. Norske Videnskabers Selskab Forh., 23 (No. 10, 1950), pages 38-40. [Annotated scanned copy]
crossrefs: See A060986 for p values, A060988 for r values.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 11 2001
